text: (aur us din ko yaad rakho) jis din har shakhs jo kuchh usane (duniya mein) nekee kee hai aur jo kuchh buraee kee hai usako maujood paega (aur) aarazoo karega ki kaash us kee badee aur usake daramiyaan mein zamaane daraaz (hael) ho jaata aur khuda tumako apane hee se daraata hai aur khuda apane bandon par bada shafeeq aur (meharabaan bhee) hai
